contexts.context: ...what he says,however odd the belief may seem to <mark>oneself</mark>. Between constructing a private yfantasy world for oneself...
...oneself. Between constructing a private yfantasy world for <mark>oneself</mark> alone and writing poetry,there is,of course,a profound difference...
